3.caption_en:
Slide titled "Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking" featuring a large "01" and three guiding questions about the importance, major trends, and three levels of ecosystem thinking for long-term business growth.

{
  "artifact_type": "slide",
  "title": "Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking",
  "number": "01",
  "orientation": "portrait",
  "background_color": "teal/turquoise",
  "primary_text_color": "white",
  "language": "English",
  "layout": "large numeral at top-left; main title centered-left; three question paragraphs stacked below title; sans-serif font",
  "text_blocks": [
    {
      "role": "number",
      "text": "01",
      "position": "top-left",
      "font_style": "bold",
      "font_size": "very large"
    },
    {
      "role": "title",
      "text": "Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking",
      "position": "upper-center-left",
      "font_style": "bold",
      "font_size": "x-large"
    },
    {
      "role": "question",
      "text": "Why is ecosystem thinking important today?",
      "position": "middle-left",
      "font_size": "medium"
    },
    {
      "role": "question",
      "text": "What are the major trends we see leading to the dominance of ecosystem based business models?",
      "position": "middle-left-lower",
      "font_size": "medium"
    },
    {
      "role": "question",
      "text": "What are the 3 levels of ecosystem thinking you need to understand and apply to unlock new growth for your business in the longterm",
      "position": "lower-middle-left",
      "font_size": "medium"
    }
  ],
  "notes": "White text on a teal background; slide poses three guiding questions for a presentation on ecosystem thinking."
}

4.caption_en: Slide 01: Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking — outlines why ecosystem thinking matters, the major trends driving ecosystem-based business models, and the three levels of ecosystem thinking to unlock long-term business growth.
4.caption_ru: Slide 01: Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking — outlines why ecosystem thinking matters, the major trends driving ecosystem-based business models, and the three levels of ecosystem thinking to unlock long-term business growth.

5.caption_en: Level 3 — Platform Ecosystem Thinking emphasizes that platforms orchestrate a wide range of stakeholders. Understanding their needs helps you win them and unlock network effects.
5.caption_ru: Level 3 — Platform Ecosystem Thinking emphasizes that platforms orchestrate a wide range of stakeholders. Understanding their needs helps you win them and unlock network effects.
